name: Data Link Connection Identifier
title: DLCI
definition: Identifies the logical connection address between the provider switch and the circuit.
usageNotes: Required when the first position of the REQTYP field on the ASR Form is “V” or “X” and the BSC field on the Transport or EUSA Form is “F” and the VST field on the VC Form is “A”, “C” or blank and the NVC field on the Transport or EUSA Form is populated, otherwise prohibited.
exampleNotes: This example illustrates a numeric value but is left justified since it is treated as text.
